text: Gujarat is an Indian state. It is geographically located on the western side of India. Gujarat is divided into four major regions: South Gujarat, North Gujarat, Central Gujarat and Saurashtra. ==Regions== *South Gujarat: Is a region in Gujarat. It is divided into six districts: Bharuch, Narmada, Tapi, Dang, Valad, Surat, and Navsari. *North Gujarat: Is a region in Gujarat. It is further divided into seven districts: Ahmedabad, Gandhinagar, Banaskantha, Patan, Aravalli, Mehsana, and Sabarkantha. *Central Gujarat: Is a region in Gujarat. This region is further divided into six districts: Bharuch, Gandhinagar, Anand, Kheda, Ahmedabad, and Vadodara. *Saurashtra and Kutch **Saurashtra region: Is an important region in Gujarat mostly covered by the Arabian Sea in the east, west, and south. It is further divided into seven districts: Rajkot, Junagadh, Jamnagar, Porbandar, Bhavnagar, Surendranagar, and Amreli. **Kutch: Is a region in western Gujarat: it shares a border with Sindh, Pakistan, and the Arabian Sea. ==References== Category:Gujarat
title: Regions of Gujarat
